title: Bigg Boss 13 wild card contestants:Hussain Kuwajerwala To Himanshi Khurana, 5 Celebs Who Might Join Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entries
text:
Bigg Boss 13 is full of controversies, fights and drama. This season has been extra ordinary in terms of the daily dose of drama that its viewers are getting. It has just been 15 days and the show has already created a lot of stir inside as well as outside the house, especially on social media.

Voot

This time, the format of the show is a little different. The finale will take place in the fourth week, and so, double eliminations are happening every week.

Voot

Meanwhile, it is said that the wild card entries will make their way to the show soon. In the coming few weeks, we might see new faces joining the show. The wildcard entries will sure change the equation between among the contestants.

Don't Miss 195 SHARES 756 SHARES 320 SHARES 1.6 K SHARES 291 SHARES

Voot

Who all will join the show? Here’s a list of Bigg Boss 13 wild card contestants that has been doing the rounds.

#1 Hussain Kuwajerwala

Twitter

Indian television actor, dancer and anchor, Hussain Kuwajerwala who is known for his roles in TV shows like Kyuki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, Kumkum and Shabaash India, among others might join Bigg Boss 13 as wild card contestant soon.

#2 Koena Mitra

wikibio.in

Koena Mitra who evicted in the first week of the show has been making a lot of waves since she is out. She has not only slammed Salman Khan for taking Shehnaz’s side and being unfair, but has also recently called Aarti Singh spineless. It is said that makers are considering to bring her back on the show.

#3 Himanshi Khurana

amazon.com

Himanshi Khurana, who is known to be Shehnaz Gill’s rival outside of the house, is also rumoured to be joining the show as a wild card contestant. Himanshi, who has featured in the song Soch, has had a tiff with Shehnaz in the real world. So much so, their war of words went viral in Punjab. If she joins Bigg Boss 13, there’ll be more drama, of course.

#4 Khesari Lal Yadav

toiimg.com

Bhojpuri actor Khesari Lal Yadav who is known for his role in Saajan Chale Sasural is reportedly going to be one of the wild card contestants on Bigg Boss 13. For the unversed, He was awarded with the prestigious Dadasaheb Phalke Academy Award and UP Ratan award in 2017.

#5 Pratik Sehajpal

ggpht.com

MTV love school and Ace of Space former contestants Pratik Sehajpal will reportedly join Bigg Boss 13 too.

Meanwhile, who do you think will be evicted from Bigg Boss 13 in today’s episode, and who’s your favourite contestant so far? Tell us in the comment section below.
description: It is said that the wild card entries on Bigg Boss 13 will make their way to the show soon. Here’s a list of Bigg Boss 13 wild card contestants that has been doing the rounds. Names include Hussain Kuwajerwala, Himanshi Khurana, Khesari Lal Yadav, Koena Mitra and Pratik Sehajpal.
